snippet: Mark Teixeira and Eric Chavez hit solo home runs in the eighth inning as the Yankees rallied past Detroit.
abstract: MLB Roundup; New York Yankees earn a 4-3 victory over the Detroit Tigers; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira and Eric Chavez hit solo home runs in the eighth inning as the Yankees rallied past Detroit.

headline.seo: Joe Girardi Is Ejected Before Yankees Beat Tigers
headline.main: Girardi Loses His Cool, but Yankees Win the Game
headline.print_headline: Girardi Loses His Cool, but Yankees Win the Game
